overview: During the Empress Wu Zetian's reign, Detective Dee supervised the case of "Red-eyed monster" causing trouble and eliminated Prince Wu Minzhi, who tried to usurp power and seize the throne, preserving the stability of Jiangshan
tagline: During the Empress Wu Zetian's reign, Detective Dee supervised the case of "Red-eyed monster" causing trouble and eliminated Prince Wu Minzhi, who tried to usurp power and seize the throne, preserving the stability of Jiangshan
title: Detective Dee: The Sly Red-eye
